# Learn about API authentication here: /python/getting-started # Find your api_key here: /settings/api import plotly.plotly as py from plotly.graph_objs import * trace1 = Scatter( x=[0, 1, 2], y=[1, 2, 3], name='First Trace', showlegend=False ) trace2 = Scatter( x=[0, 1, 2, 3], y=[8, 4, 2, 0], name='Second Trace', showlegend=True ) data = Data([trace1, trace2]) plot_url = py.plot(data, filename='show-legend')
